Diamond Rush

CSE 102 (c-project) : An classical Nokia adventure game remade with an OpenGL wrapper igraphics library. It includes features like “New Game”, “Save game”, ”Load Game”, ”Hall of fame”. (2019) </br> Watch Gameplay:
